about.name: Diego Rafael Lucio
about.roleHtml:
Ph.D. in Computer Science
Backend Engineer • AI Researcher
about.leadHtml: Ph.D. in Computer Science with 10+ years of experience combining full-stack development and advanced research in Artificial Intelligence. Senior developer with solid experience in modern backend technologies (Python with Django/FastAPI and Java with Spring Boot) and frontend (React.js/Next.js). Expert in Machine Learning and Computer Vision, with a track record delivering biometrics and facial recognition solutions in production.
highlights: Backend: FastAPI, Django REST Framework, Spring Boot, Kafka, RabbitMQ, Redis, SQL/NoSQL
ML/CV: PyTorch, TensorFlow, OpenCV, ONNX Runtime, TensorRT

experience.title: Tokenology (Miami, USA)
bullets: Led facial recognition and liveness detection systems (Vision Transformers, attention models).
Implemented fraud detection in liveness detection (deepfake detection and presentation attacks).
Built biometric verification pipelines with high accuracy/low latency using PyTorch + ONNX Runtime.
Integrated biometrics with Spring Boot microservices for scalability and security.
Deployed distributed caching/session management, reducing API response times by 40%.
experience.tech: Python (PyTorch, ONNX, FastAPI), Java (Spring Boot), Docker, AWS, Redis

experience.title: Tokenology (Miami, USA)
bullets: Developed facial recognition models (ArcFace/CosFace) for challenging scenarios.
Implemented liveness detection with deep learning for motion and facial expression.

Implemented pub/sub and caching for model predictions, improving performance by 35%.
experience.tech: Python (PyTorch, TensorRT, FastAPI), Java (Spring Boot), Docker, AWS
